text: "I Believe I Can Fly" is a song by R&B; singer R. Kelly. It was originally released on November 26, 1996. It was also featured on the soundtrack to the movie Space Jam in 1996. It later appeared in Kelly's album R. in 1998. The song peaked at number one in many countries around the world. The song won three Grammy Awards out of five nominations. Category:1996 songs Category:R. Kelly songs Category:Space Jam
title: I Believe I Can Fly
